page.title: 02COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: There are all sorts of{communications in Lapford like{Televisions,radio,cb's {,postal service and Telegraph}.Just about everyone in Lapford has got a {Radio,television}and{Telephone},but not many people have got{cb's}.The post comes about seven o'clock in the morning.Just about all of the old people have got {Telephones}but some of them have'nt got a {Television}.I think everyone in the village has got a Radio.For some people the {post {office}is a long walk,like old people at the of the village.But for most people the {post office}is not far away.The people who want a paper have one delivered and some people have a Sunday paper delivered.There are two telephone boxes and three post boxes. { }
